headline: Zillow’s Ongoing Mass Infringement of CoStar Group’s Intellectual Property
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., September 30, 2025--CoStar Group, Inc. (NASDAQ: CSGP), a leading provider of online real estate marketplaces, information, analytics, and 3D digital twin technology, today provided an update on its July lawsuit against Zillow Group, Inc. Undeterred, Zillow continues to infringe CoStar Group’s intellectual property on a massive scale, months after being sued.
